review_data.title: Authentic Italian piadina
review_data.content: Tasty piadina with a handful of ingredients to choose from. I also like the brown paper bag (better for the environment) with a side pocket for the paper napkin. Also the ristretto (known as coffee in Italy :-)) is as close as you can get...More

review_data.title: Very delicious!
review_data.content: We ordered take-away twice when we were in Zurich. Really good and we love their piadinas! We will try them again if we are back in Zurich!

review_data.title: Essen👌🏼,Preis naja, nur für kleiner Hunger

review_data.title: Ein Kleinod in der Altstadt

review_data.title: Fantastic Piadina

review_data.title: Great little place to grab a Piadina
review_data.content: Great little place to grab and go “piadina” sandwich. A little challenging to read menu and order due to language barrier. Staff appeared “frustrated” with us trying to ask questions but we got through it.

review_data.title: Excellent spot along Niederdorfstrasse
review_data.content: Strolling down the Niederdorfstrasse, we came upon this cute little place. Perfect for a lunch spot. The piadinas were excellent and the two working the shop were very cordial and friendly staff. We ordered three different piadinas and drinks and settle down for lunch. There...More

review_data.title: Beste Piadina EVER

review_data.title: High quality food
review_data.content: Never had such an excellent piadina and for Zurich it’s reasonably priced as well! The staff there is super friendly and helpful. Even during lunch time, when it’s very busy they do their best to serve you as fast as they can. Extremely content!

review_data.title: Beware of racist staff

review_data.title: Gemütlich und schon beinahe Kultstatus

review_data.title: Light and easy dinner option

review_data.title: Intermezzo shopping

review_data.title: Favorite spot for a light lunch!
review_data.content: I first discovered Piadina Bar 15 years ago, and it remains a must-go place for me every time I visit Zürich. Cute atmosphere, tucked away on the Niederdorf — easy to bypass and look over, but don't! Parma Stracchino Rucola is my go to and...More

review_data.title: Exceptionnel et fait minute

review_data.title: Delicious!

review_data.title: Good place to have a good snack!
review_data.content: First of all, I like prosciutto San Daniele, so it was a very appropriate snack for me! Piadina with mozarella and prosciutto, accompanied with Falken beer!

review_data.title: Best Piadinas in town!

review_data.title: Great lunch place
review_data.content: Uncomplicated and very charming lunch bar which serves very nice piadina (toasted pancakes with meat, cheese and other fillings) "sandwiches" and nice selection of drinks. Beautiful interior.

review_data.title: Great place for a cheap lunch in an expensive city

review_data.title: Excellent piadina, cute bar

review_data.title: Italy by Swiss hands
review_data.content: A place to enjoy the ambiance and of course the food. Nice drinks to choose, Zurich price and Switzerland food quality Italian style, piadina light and enjoyable sandwich! Love this place.

review_data.title: Great Piadina
review_data.content: I brought up with Piadina, and I can tell this is a really good Piadina, cooked on the spot with quality ingredients. Price is high if compared to Italy, however it is fair for being in the centre of Zurich. Highly recommended.

review_data.title: Great find!
review_data.content: What a nice surprise - always trust the place that locals are going to! Chill atmosphere, fresh ingredients, great flavor, and reasonable for Swiss standards :)

review_data.title: A really good piadina
review_data.content: I have been a few times to the Piadina bar, the piadine that they prepare are really good and they are filled with fresch and delicious ingredients. The diameter of the piadine is rather small, but the taste is very good. Definitely recommended.
